llm_res.rule: transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The contract must handle the receipt of ERC721 tokens correctly by implementing the ERC721TokenReceiver interface if it will accept safe transfers.
transferFrom function should return true on success.
The contract must correctly return metadata for each NFT when the tokenURI function is called, adhering to the ERC721Metadata interface.
